title: ‘It’s Impossible to Be at Your Best on the Road’: Sean Kelly Says Tom Pidcock Needs to Consider Multi-Discipline Priorities
content:
Amid Ineos Grenadiers tensions, cycling expert Kelly says differing demands from sponsors may be complicating things for Pidcock’s career.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Impossible to Be at Your Best on the Road’: Sean Kelly Says Tom Pidcock Needs to Consider Multi-Discipline Priorities on Velo.
author: sstokes
